title: Premium Mulch only $2 at Lowes {Ends Tonight!}
description: Planning on doing some landscaping soon? Here are some great deals at Lowes this week! Through April 16th, Lowe’s has Premium 2-cu ft Mulch on sale for just $2! Choose from several colors. You can also purchase this online and pick up in store. Valid through April 16, 2025. Lowe’s is having their huge SpringFest sale rightRead More
